text:
@WhiteHouse Trump took a strong economy & absolutely destroyed it with his incompetent,  misguided & failed handling of the COVID-19 pandemic.

100K dead in the US, a multi trillion dollar bailout and 35M+ on unemployment. The USA has the worst economy in 80+ years.
